description:
DOKONJOFINGER and SHINGANCRIMSONZ participate in an excavation to find treasure and earn money, but they find themselves in trouble during the dig.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Oretachi wa Shinkoushoku no I`m Joker de (Chuuryaku) Obento Magnum
We`re Crimson I`m Joker (Etc.) and Obento Magnum
オレ達は深紅色のI`mJOKERで(中略)OBENTO MAGNUM
